item.title: Foxtel M&A 贷款银行酝酿提高保证金以吸引投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，为英国流媒体平台 DAZN Group Ltd. 收购澳大利亚付费电视公司 Foxtel Management Ltd. 提供贷款支持的银行正在考虑提高债务的利息保证金，以吸引机构贷款人的兴趣。【原文：Banks on a loan backing UK streaming platform DAZN Group Ltd.’s takeover of Australian pay-television company Foxtel Management Ltd. are considering lifting the debt’s interest margin to draw interest from institutional lenders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马来西亚伊斯兰领导人称遭监视，电话被窃听
item.description: 马来西亚伊斯兰党的一位高级领导人说，他在该国边境系统中被标记为旅行管制人员后，受到了国家监控，他的电话也被窃听。【原文：A senior leader of Malaysia’s Islamist party said he was under state surveillance and his phone was tapped after he was flagged for travel control in the country’s border systems, a claim that the government has downplayed.】

item.title: 特斯拉中国取消两款进口电动汽车的 "立即订购 "选项
item.description: 就在中国对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）加征关税进行报复的几天前，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc.’s website in China has removed the ‘order now’ option for Model S and Model X electric vehicles, which are both imported, just days after China retaliated against US President Donald Trump’s tariffs by raising levies of its own.】

item.title: 贸易战将减少中国对美国塑料原料的需求
item.description: 由于北京和华盛顿之间的贸易战导致成本上升，中国对用于生产塑料的一些构件的需求将下降。【原文：China’s demand for some of the building blocks used to produce plastics is set to drop as costs rise because of the trade war between Beijing and Washington.】

item.title: 贸易战影响出口，中国稀土出口受阻
item.description: 上周，在与美国不断升级的贸易战中，中国对稀土关键材料实施了新的限制措施，生产商正在努力应对更严格的许可要求，因此中国的稀土矿产品出口几乎处于停滞状态。【原文：Chinese exports of rare-earth minerals are all but on hold as producers grapple with tighter permit requirements following last week’s new restrictions on the critical materials in an escalating trade war with the US.】

item.title: 受关税冲击，亚洲大型 ETF 在美国的交易价格失真
item.description: 由于交易商急于押注亚洲股市反弹，一些在美国上市的追踪亚洲股市的最大交易所交易基金周三出现溢价飙升。【原文：Some of the largest US-listed exchange-traded funds tracking Asian equities saw premiums leap on Wednesday as traders rushed to place bets on rebounds in the region’s stocks.】

item.title: 中国业务放缓，TikTok 推动字节跳动增长 29
item.description: 在在线视频风头正劲的 TikTok 推动了全球扩张，帮助抵消了中国国内的经济衰退之后，字节跳动有限公司的收入在 2024 年猛增 29%，达到 1,550 亿美元。【原文：ByteDance Ltd.’s revenue jumped 29% to $155 billion in 2024, after online video phenom TikTok drove a worldwide expansion that helped offset an economic downturn back home in China.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将两次降息，政策听命于特朗普
item.description: 彭博社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，欧洲央行官员可能会再削减两次借贷成本，尽管他们最终会听从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的建议。【原文：European Central Bank officials are likely to cut borrowing costs twice more, though they will ultimately take their cue from US President Donald Trump, according to a Bloomberg survey of economists.】

item.title: 欧盟国家将支持更灵活的天然气储藏充气方式
item.description: 欧盟成员国将支持更灵活的冬季前天然气储存充气规则，因为有人批评目前的目标人为地抬高了价格。【原文：European Union member states are set to back more flexible rules for filling gas storage before winter, amid criticism that current targets artificially raise prices.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 2 和索尼 PS5 可能因关税而涨价
item.description: 根据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）的最新研究，日本娱乐业巨头任天堂公司和索尼集团公司可能会提高其游戏机的价格，以应对美国的关税。【原文：Japanese entertainment giants Nintendo Co. and Sony Group Corp. are likely to raise prices on their game consoles in response to US tariffs, according to the latest research from Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 贝恩寻求为新亚洲私募股权基金筹集至少 70 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，贝恩资本正寻求为其下一支亚洲基金和该地区的一支特殊情况基金筹集数十亿美元资金，以支持从日本到印度等国家的私募股权和信贷交易。【原文：Bain Capital is looking to raise billions of dollars for its next Asia fund and a special situation fund in the region, as it moves to back private equity and credit deals in countries from Japan to India, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行退出债券购买刺激吸引外资的努力
item.description: 日本央行决定缩减购买政府债券的规模，这迫使日本财务省加大力度吸引海外买家，试图取代每年超过 100 亿美元的资金来源。【原文：The Bank of Japan’s decision to scale back its purchases of government bonds is forcing the Ministry of Finance to step up efforts to lure overseas buyers as it attempts to replace a source of annual funding exceeding $10 billion.】

item.title: 国债交易突然变得像风险资产，向特朗普发出警告
item.description: 在华尔街，美国国债被誉为 "稳如磐石、安全无风险"，长期以来一直是投资者在恐慌时期的第一选择。在全球金融危机期间、911事件中，甚至在美国自身信用评级被下调时，美国国债都出现了反弹。【原文：Billed on Wall Street as so rock-solid safe they’re risk-free, US Treasury bonds have long served as first port of call for investors during times of panic. They rallied during the global financial crisis, on 9/11 and even when America’s own credit rating was cut.】

item.description: 中国开发商碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Chinese developer Country Garden Holdings Co. said it secured support from a key group of bondholders for its offshore restructuring plan, as the defaulted property firm continues to seek broader creditor agreement.】

item.title: 特朗普升级关税战，习近平将访问东南亚
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平将于下周访问东南亚三国，中国正加紧努力争取合作伙伴，以缓冲与美国不断升级的贸易战对中国经济的影响。【原文：President Xi Jinping will visit three Southeast Asian countries next week, as China steps up efforts to court partners to buffer the economy against an escalating trade war with the US.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴的马云希望人工智能为人类服务，而不是主宰人类
item.description: 阿里巴巴联合创始人马云是人工智能的长期倡导者，他警告说，人工智能不应取代人类，而应努力满足人类的各种需求。【原文：Alibaba co-founder Jack Ma, a longstanding advocate for artificial intelligence, warned that AI shouldn’t replace humans but work instead to meet their every need.】

item.title: 胚胎混杂导致婴儿出生，莫纳什试管婴儿公司股价暴跌
item.description: 周五，莫纳什试管婴儿集团有限公司（Monash IVF Group Ltd.）暴跌27%，创下五年多来的最大盘中跌幅，因为这家生殖保健公司称，一名患者的胚胎被错误地植入另一名患者体内，导致一名婴儿出生。【原文：Monash IVF Group Ltd. plunged as much as 27% on Friday, the steepest intraday drop in more than five years, after the reproductive health-care company said that an embryo belonging to one patient was mistakenly implanted into another, resulting in the birth of a child.】

item.title: 菲律宾表示，尽管局势动荡，仍将继续持有美国国债
item.description: 尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统不断变化的关税行动引发了全球金融市场的动荡，但菲律宾不会减持美国国债。【原文：The Philippines won’t cut its holdings of US Treasuries despite turmoil in global financial markets triggered by President Donald Trump’s changing tariff actions.】

item.title: 美国加征 145% 关税，中国股市结束三日连涨
item.description: 在美国宣布对中国征收高达 145% 的惊人关税后，中国股市表现得相对平静。【原文：Chinese shares showed relative composure after the US said its tariffs on China amounted to a staggering 145%.】

item.title: 为什么特朗普的 "美国制造 "iPhone 之梦不会实现？
item.description: 对于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普来说，最大的胜利莫过于拥有了史上最受欢迎的科技产品之一--国产版 iPhone。这样的胜利将验证他的关税计划和将制造业工作带回美国的竞选承诺。【原文：For US President Donald Trump, there would be few bigger victories than having a domestically produced version of the iPhone, one of the most popular tech products in history. Such a prize would validate his tariff plan and campaign promise to bring manufacturing jobs back to America.】

item.title: 如果贝森特在关税谈判中提及外汇，日本将讨论外汇问题
item.description: 日本最高贸易代表表示，如果美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）提出这个话题，他将在贸易谈判中讨论外汇问题。【原文：Japan’s top trade representative said he’ll discuss foreign exchange as part of trade talks should US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent bring up the topic.】

item.title: 关税不确定性笼罩下，台积电、CATL 将提供供应链线索

Ltd.’s earnings outlook might offer clues on global supply chain disruptions as US President Donald Trump’s tariff moves roil global markets.】

item.title: Pictet 基金回购三星股票，看中更安全的芯片赌注
item.description: 一家表现优于同行的股票基金正在回购三星电子公司的股票，打赌这家芯片制造商的股票能比竞争对手更好地抵御市场波动。【原文：An equity fund that’s outperforming peers is buying back into Samsung Electronics Co., wagering that the chipmaker’s stock can withstand market gyrations better than its rivals.】
